original_text: When they saw what had happened, the sailors became very afraid of the Lord's power. They offered a sacrifice to him and they promised that they would serve him.
korean_text: 그 사람들이 여호와를 크게 두려워하여 여호와께 제물을 드리고 서원을 하였더라

sentences.original_text: When they saw what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 무슨 일이 일어났는지 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: They offered a sacrifice to him
and they promised that they would serve him
